titles: The grand cheat cryed up under-hand by many in the factious and giddy part of the Army; and greedily swallowed down by many people that do not discern the poyson and danger thereof; in severall particulars, as followeth. / By one that was a member of the Army whilst they were obedient to authority.
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: England and Wales. --  Army --  Early works to 1800.
